name: Hugh Dunnit and the Murder at Mc`Guilty Mansion
name_original: Hugh Dunnit and the Murder at Mc`Guilty Mansion
description:
Four of the world`s greatest detectives are called to investigate a gruesome murder at the Mc'Guilty Mansion. However, things go haywire when the dead body goes missing and the detectives are trapped in a room! Play as Detective Hugh Dunnit, looking for clues and talking with the other detectives to solve the mystery and escape the locked room.

UT Game Jam 2020 Submission by  Team B8ED

  • Tristan Punzel - lead programmer
  • Adam Yassine - narrative designer/editor
  • Jimmy Liu - sprite artist/animator
  • Colin O'Neill - lead sound designer
  • Kirstie Marler - character/environment/UI/menu artist 
  • Alana Hernandez - cutscene artist/writer
  • Stephanie Martin - character/environment artist
